testcase.classname: Verify Registration page Functionality with DataDriven Testing
testcase.name: verify registration functionality with multiple Data
testcase.system-out: Given User is on register page..............................................passed When user Enter "prasanna" and "Kumar"......................................passed And user should enter "prasannakumar@gmail.com" and "9550335422" also.......passed When user click on register btn............................................passed Then user should get success Message notification...........................passed Then user should navigate to homePage directly..............................passed

testcase.name: calculating netsalary functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user should navigate to calculation page..............................passed When user enter grosssalary "480000"........................................passed And user enter "0" and "43200" and "6000"...................................passed Then user should get NetSalary information "430800".........................passed

testcase.name: calculating netsalary functionality 2
testcase.system-out: Given user should navigate to calculation page..............................passed When user enter grosssalary "800000"........................................passed And user enter "40000" and "30000" and "6000"...............................passed Then user should get NetSalary information "724000".........................passed
